fixed_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to 114.8/118.7/122.6% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 16% for foes with an elemental ailment.
fixed_skill.name: Frei

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 58.2/61.1/64.0% of Attack (2 hits).
innate_skill.name: Double Fangs

innate_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 4.6% when surrounded by enemies.
innate_skill.name: Adverse Resolve I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack 5.8%. After a Baton Pass, increase Nuclear damage by 23% for 1 turn.
passive_skill.name: Relentless Pursuit

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack 5.8%. After a Baton Pass, increase Nuclear damage by 27% for 1 turn.
passive_skill.name: Relentless Pursuit I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
